author: Gary147
title: Great hotel, location and staff.
text:
Had an overnight stay here whilst visiting Paris. From check in to out, we could not have enjoyed our time here any better. The staff are so professional, polite and helpful, we were given recommendations and directions to everything we asked about and it made our weekend a great success. The hotel itself is perfectly located close to the main attractions in the centre of Paris, but was peaceful and quiet at night.
Many thanks to all the staff, we would not hesitate to stay here again.
